content:
I think I can improve these post ideas by mentioning that I've been taking online courses to improve my social media marketing skills. Here are three new post ideas:

**Post 1: Exclusive Offer**

"I've been working hard to improve my social media skills, and I'm excited to celebrate by offering 15% OFF all orders for the next 48 hours! Head to our website (link in bio) to explore our sustainable fashion collection and use code LAUNCH15 at checkout. Thanks for supporting my learning journey! #EcoChicLaunch #SustainableFashion #ExclusiveOffer"

**Post 2: Product Showcase**

"I've been dedicating 2 hours every evening to watching tutorials and practicing social media marketing, and I'm thrilled to showcase our newest arrivals! Our sustainable fashion collection features stylish and eco-friendly pieces that will make you feel good and do good. Explore our website (link in bio) to discover more and get 10% off your first order! #EcoCh
